resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76523</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76523</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-d9bc-42ad-2430-e13707111b8b#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent Servatius mellkeresztje</string>
            <string language="en">Saint Servatius pectoral cross</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliger Servatius Brustkreuz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croix pectorale de Saint Servatius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cruz pectoral de Saint Servatius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Traversa pectoral del San Servatius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θωρακικός σταυρός Αγίου Servatius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cruz pectoral de Santo Servatius</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">rekeszzománc- és ékkőberakásos arany mellkereszt.</string>
            <string language="en">golden pectoral cross from cloissoné enamel and precious stone inlaid</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  honfoglalás kor,  palmetta,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, Hungarian settlement era, palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">goldenes Brustkreuz von der cloissoné 
Emaille und vom kostbaren Stein legte ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la croix pectorale d'or de l'émail de 
cloissoné et de la pierre précieuse a marqueté</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a cruz pectoral dourada do esmalte do cloissoné 
e da pedra preciosa embutiu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la traversa pectoral dorata dallo smalto del 
cloissoné e dalla pietra preziosa ha intarsiato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρυσός θωρακικός σταυρός το σμάλτο cloissonι και 
τον πολύτιμο λίθο που ενθέτονται από</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la cruz pectoral de oro del esmalte del 
cloissoné y de la piedra preciosa embutió</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, ungarische Regelung Ära, 
palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, ère hongroise de règlement, 
palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, era hungarian do estabelecimento, 
palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, era ungherese di stabilimento, 
palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, ουγγρική εποχή τακτοποίησης, palmette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, era húngara del establecimiento, 
palmette</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76523</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40cf0aec-d9bc-42ad-2430-e13707111b8b&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
